challenge.name: Goblin Crypt Challenge
challenge.desc: Defeat powerful enemies to climb levels! More difficult and better rewards with each higher level!

challenge.name: Dragon Crypt Challenge
challenge.desc: Defeat powerful enemies to climb levels! More difficult and better rewards with each higher level!

challenge.name: Undead Crypt Challenge
challenge.desc: Defeat powerful enemies to climb levels! More difficult and better rewards with each higher level!

challenge.name: Heal Crypt Challenge
challenge.desc: Defeat powerful enemies to climb levels! More difficult and better rewards with each higher level!

challenge.name: Poisondart Clash Challenge
challenge.desc: Battle to earn stars and rewards! Frogs gain Poisonbolt equal to 50% of their base Attack and all enemies start with a Castle Tower card in play! Attacks recharge once per day!

challenge.name: Relentless Clash Challenge
challenge.desc: Battle to earn stars and rewards! Undead gain Berserk equal to 30% of their base Attack and all enemies start with a Castle Tower card in play! Attacks recharge once per day!

challenge.name: Heavenly Clash Challenge
challenge.desc: Battle to earn stars and rewards! Angels gain Legion equal to 50% of their base Attack and all enemies start with a Castle Tower card in play! Attacks recharge once per day!

challenge.name: Dragonfire Clash Challenge
challenge.desc: Battle to earn stars and rewards! Dragons gain Scorch equal to 20% of their base Health and all enemies start with a Castle Tower card in play! Attacks recharge once per day!

challenge.name: Empowering Clash Challenge
challenge.desc: Battle to earn stars and rewards! Empower and Empower All is 50% stronger and all enemies start with a Castle Tower card in play! Attacks recharge once per day!

challenge.name: Thunderdome Clash Challenge
challenge.desc: Battle to earn stars and rewards! Bolt and Bolt All is 50% stronger and all enemies start with a Castle Tower card in play! Attacks recharge once per day!

challenge.name: Berserker Rage Clash Challenge
challenge.desc: Battle to earn stars and rewards! Berserk is 50% stronger and all enemies start with a Castle Tower card in play! Attacks recharge once per day!

challenge.name: Armored Clash Challenge
challenge.desc: Battle to earn stars and rewards! Armor is 50% stronger and all enemies start with a Castle Tower card in play! Attacks recharge once per day!

challenge.name: Equilibrium Clash Challenge
challenge.desc: Battle to earn stars and rewards! All enemies start with a Castle Tower card in play! Attacks recharge once per day!

challenge.name: Vanishing Clash Challenge
challenge.desc: Battle to earn stars and rewards! All creatures gain Invisibility 99 and all enemies start with a Castle Tower card in play! Attacks recharge once per day!

challenge.name: Forge Clash Challenge
challenge.desc: Battle to earn stars and rewards! All creatures gain Armor 99 and Scorch equal to 10% of their base Health. Enemy starts with a Castle Tower card in play! Attacks recharge once per day!

challenge.name: Null Clash Challenge
challenge.desc: Battle to earn stars and rewards! All creatures gain Nullify 99. Enemy starts with a Castle Tower card in play! Attacks recharge once per day!

challenge.name: Acid Clash Challenge
challenge.desc: Battle to earn stars and rewards! All creatures gain Corrosive 99. Enemy starts with a Castle Tower card in play! Attacks recharge once per day!

challenge.name: Flash Clash Challenge
challenge.desc: Battle to earn stars and rewards! All creatures are 1 Delay. Enemy starts with a Castle Tower card in play! Attacks recharge once per day!

challenge.name: Immunity Clash Challenge
challenge.desc: Battle to earn stars and rewards! All creatures gain Ward 99. Enemy starts with a Castle Tower card in play! Attacks recharge once per day!

challenge.name: Rune Clash Challenge
challenge.desc: Battle to earn stars and rewards! All bonuses from Runes are doubled. Enemy starts with a Castle Tower card in play! Attacks recharge once per day!

challenge.name: Fury Clash Challenge
challenge.desc: Battle to earn stars and rewards! All creatures are Enraged for 20% of their base Health each turn. Enemy starts with a Castle Tower card in play! Attacks recharge once per day!

challenge.name: Powderkeg Clash Challenge
challenge.desc: Battle to earn stars and rewards! All creatures gain Barrage equal to their base Attack. Enemy starts with a Castle Tower card in play! Attacks recharge once per day!

challenge.name: Airborne Clash Challenge
challenge.desc: Battle to earn stars and rewards! All Dragons regenerate 25% of their base Health, all Avians gain Mark equal to 15% of their Health, and all Angels gain Legion equal to 50% of their Attack. Enemy starts with a Castle Tower card! Attacks recharge once per day!

challenge.name: Graves & Gears Clash Challenge
challenge.desc: Battle to earn stars and rewards! All Mecha gain Ward equal to 3 plus 10% of their base Health and when an Undead dies it creates an Unearthed Skeleton token creature. Enemy starts with a Castle Tower card! Attacks recharge once per day!

challenge.name: Swarms & Seas Clash Challenge
challenge.desc: Battle to earn stars and rewards! All Seafolk gain a Barrier each turn equal to 30% of their base Health while on delay and Insects gain Venom equal to 10% of their Health. Enemy starts with a Castle Tower card in play! Attacks recharge once per day!

challenge.name: Conflux Clash Challenge
challenge.desc: Battle to earn stars and rewards! Aether have their Attack increased by 50% of the base, Chaos gain Vengeance equal to 50% of base Attack, and Wyld gain an additional 25% base Health. Enemy starts with a Castle Tower card! Attacks recharge once per day!

challenge.name: Aether Triumph Clash Challenge
challenge.desc: Battle to earn stars and rewards! Aether have their Attack and Health increased by 25% of the base. Enemy starts with a Castle Tower card in play! Attacks recharge once per day!

challenge.name: Chaos Triumph Clash Challenge
challenge.desc: Battle to earn stars and rewards! Chaos have their Attack and Health increased by 25% of the base. Enemy starts with a Castle Tower card in play! Attacks recharge once per day!

challenge.name: Wyld Triumph Clash Challenge
challenge.desc: Battle to earn stars and rewards! Wyld have their Attack and Health increased by 25% of the base. Enemy starts with a Castle Tower card in play! Attacks recharge once per day!

challenge.name: Inferno Clash Challenge
challenge.desc: Battle to earn stars and rewards! Scorch, Emberhide, and Scorchbreath have their effects increased by 50%. Enemy starts with a Castle Tower card in play! Attacks recharge once per day!

challenge.name: Battlefield Clash Challenge
challenge.desc: Battle to earn stars and rewards! Empower, Legion, and Berserk have their effects increased by 50%. Enemy starts with a Castle Tower card in play! Attacks recharge once per day!

challenge.name: Snowstorm Clash Challenge
challenge.desc: Battle to earn stars and rewards! Bolt, Frostbreath, and Weaken have their effects increased by 50%. Enemy starts with a Castle Tower card in play! Attacks recharge once per day!

challenge.name: Swamp Clash Challenge
challenge.desc: Battle to earn stars and rewards! Poison, Corrosive, and Hex have their effects increased by 50%. Enemy starts with a Castle Tower card in play! Attacks recharge once per day!

challenge.name: Fortress Clash Challenge
challenge.desc: Battle to earn stars and rewards! Armor, Barrier, and Pierce have their effects increased by 50%. Enemy starts with a Castle Tower card in play! Attacks recharge once per day!

challenge.name: Recovery Clash Challenge
challenge.desc: Battle to earn stars and rewards! Heal, Siphon, and Regenerate have their effects increased by 50%. Enemy starts with a Castle Tower card in play! Attacks recharge once per day!

challenge.name: Common Revenge Challenge
challenge.desc: Battle to earn stars and rewards! All Common cards have their Attack, Health, and all Skills multiplied by 6! Enemy starts with a Castle Tower card in play! Attacks recharge once per day!

challenge.name: Common Firework Challenge
challenge.desc: Battle to earn stars and rewards! All Common cards have their Health and all Skills multiplied by 5! In addition, they gain Barrage equal to 5 times their base Attack! Enemy starts with a Castle Tower card in play! Attacks recharge once per day!

event_reward.desc: Complete the Challenge at Rank 10 or higher.
Complete the Challenge at Rank 25 or higher.
Complete the Challenge at Rank 50 or higher.
Complete the Challenge at Rank 75 or higher.
Complete the Challenge at Rank 100 or higher.
Complete the Challenge at Rank 150 or higher.
Complete the Challenge at Rank 250 or higher.
Complete the Challenge at Rank 350 or higher.
Complete the Challenge at Rank 500 or higher.
Complete the Challenge at Rank 750 or higher.
Complete the Challenge at Rank 1000 or higher.
Complete the Challenge at Rank 2000 or higher.
Complete the Challenge at Rank 5000 or higher.
Complete the Challenge at Rank 20000 or higher.

challenge.name: Gigantic Clash Challenge
challenge.desc: Battle to earn stars and rewards! All cards double their base attack and HP! Enemy starts with a Castle Tower card in play! Attacks recharge once per day!

challenge.name: Unlife Clash Challenge
challenge.desc: Battle to earn stars and rewards! When any card dies it creates an Unearthed Skeleton token creature! Enemy starts with a Castle Tower card in play! Attacks recharge once per day!

challenge.name: Sanctuary Clash Challenge
challenge.desc: All cards gain Shroud 99.

challenge.name: Revenge Clash Challenge
challenge.desc: Backlash +50%, Emberhide +50%, Vengeance +50%

challenge.name: Crushing Wave Clash Challenge
challenge.desc: Battle to earn stars and rewards! Frogs and Seafolk deal extra damage on their first attack each turn equal to 25% of their base Health! Enemy starts with a Castle Tower card in play! Attacks recharge once per day!

challenge.name: Doubling Clash Challenge
challenge.desc: All cards gain dualstrike every 1.

challenge.name: Firepower Clash Challenge
challenge.desc: Bolt, Frostbreath, Hex, HP +100%

challenge.name: Decay Clash Challenge
challenge.desc: Scorch, Scorchbreath, Poison, Emberhide, HP +100%

challenge.name: Detonation Clash
challenge.desc: On Death, all cards Barrage 50% HP

challenge.name: Epic Madness Challenge
challenge.desc: Battle to earn stars and rewards! All Epic cards have their Attack, Health, and all Skills multiplied by 2! Enemy starts with a Castle Tower card in play! Attacks recharge once per day!

challenge.name: Deathtouch Clash Challenge
challenge.desc: Battle to earn stars and rewards! All cards gain Poison 99, Ward and Armor 25. Enemy starts with a Castle Tower card in play! Attacks recharge once per day!

challenge.name: Paradox Clash Challenge
challenge.desc: Battle to earn stars and rewards! All cards gain Daze 15 and Valor 15. Enemy starts with a Castle Tower card in play! Attacks recharge once per day!

challenge.name: One Shot Clash Challenge
challenge.desc: Battle to earn stars and rewards! All cards gain Regenerate 99 and Berserk 10. Enemy starts with a Castle Tower card in play! Attacks recharge once per day!

challenge.name: Beast's Bounty Clash Challenge
challenge.desc: Battle to earn stars and rewards! All Aether gain Armor. All Chaos gain Enrage. All Wyld gain Berserk. Beasts gain all three skills! Values are equal to 10% of base Health. Enemy starts with a Castle Tower card in play! Attacks recharge once per day!

challenge.name: Aether Redux Clash Challenge
challenge.desc: Battle to earn stars and rewards! Aether have their Health increased by 40% of the base. Enemy starts with a Castle Tower card in play! Attacks recharge once per day!

challenge.name: Chaos Redux Clash Challenge
challenge.desc: Battle to earn stars and rewards! Chaos have their Attack increased by 25% of the base. Enemy starts with a Castle Tower card in play! Attacks recharge once per day!

challenge.name: Battlefield II Clash Challenge
challenge.desc: Battle to earn stars and rewards! Empower, Legion, and Berserk have their effects increased by 25%. Enemy starts with a Castle Tower card in play! Attacks recharge once per day!

challenge.name: Vampirism Clash Challenge
challenge.desc: Battle to earn stars and rewards! All card gain Vampirism 10. Enemy starts with a Castle Tower card in play! Attacks recharge once per day!

challenge.name: Burning Hell Clash Challenge
challenge.desc: Battle to earn stars and rewards! All card gain Scorchbreath equal to thrice their delay. Enemy starts with a Castle Tower card in play! Attacks recharge once per day!

challenge.name: Epic Return Challenge
challenge.desc: Battle to earn stars and rewards! All Epic cards have their Attack, Health, and all Skills increased by 75%! Freeze and Dualstrike are not affected. Enemy starts with a Castle Tower card in play! Attacks recharge once per day!

challenge.name: Eternal Barrage Clash Challenge
challenge.desc: Battle to earn stars and rewards! All creatures gain Barrage equal to their base Attack. Enemy starts with a Tree of Eternity Tower card in play! Attacks recharge once per day!

challenge.name: Guild Clash Practice Challenge
challenge.desc: Practice for the Guild Clash to earn stars and rewards! Same battleground conditions as Guild Clash including current active global effects. All attacks are available for the start!
